com.intel.icecp.module.storage.persistence.providers

Interface LegacyStorageProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StorageProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StorageProviderFacade

    public interface LegacyStorageProvider
    The interface for the Legacy Storage provider.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beginTransaction()
      Begin database transaction
      void commitTransaction()
      Commit database transaction
      long createSession(URI channelName)
      Create session for a given channel.
      long createSession(URI channelName, int maximumBufferingPeriodInSecond)
      Create session for a given channel with maximum buffering period in second associated with the session.
      void deleteMessage(long sessionId, long channelSequenceNumber)
      Delete messages for a given sessionId and persistentMessageId in byte format.

      Delete messages for a given sessionId.

      Gets all channels for which there are sessions.

      • beginTransaction

        void beginTransaction()
               throws StorageModuleException
        Begin database transaction
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException

      • commitTransaction

        void commitTransaction()
        Commit database transaction

      • rollbackTransaction

        void rollbackTransaction()
        Rollback database transaction

      • getChannels

        Set<URI> getChannels()
        Gets all channels for which there are sessions.
        Returns:
        the channels

      • createSession

        long createSession(URI channelName)
            throws StorageModuleException
        Create session for a given channel.
        Parameters:
        channelName - the channel name
        Returns:
        the session identifier
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException

      • createSession

        long createSession(URI channelName,
                   int maximumBufferingPeriodInSecond)
            throws StorageModuleException
        Create session for a given channel with maximum buffering period in second associated with the session.
        Parameters:
        channelName - the channel name
        maximumBufferingPeriodInSecond - the buffer period in second to hold to-be-uploaded data in the storage
        Returns:
        the new session identifier
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException

      • renameSession

        long renameSession(URI channelName,
                   long sessionId)
            throws StorageModuleException
        Creates a new session linked to an older session. The older session is closed.
        Parameters:
        channelName - the channel name
        sessionId - the session identifier to rename
        Returns:
        the new session identifier created by rename
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException

      • getSessions

        Set<Collection<Long>> getSessions(URI channelName)
        Gets linked sessions for a given channel URI. The newest session starts the collection in the linked sessions.
        Parameters:
        channelName - the channel name URI
        Returns:
        set of linked sessions

      • getSessions

        Set<Collection<Long>> getSessions(long querySessionId)
        Gets linked sessions for a given session Id. The newest session starts the collection in the linked sessions.
        Parameters:
        querySessionId - the session identifier
        Returns:
        set of linked sessions

      • getSessionsWithActiveMessages

        Set<Collection<Long>> getSessionsWithActiveMessages(long querySessionId)
        Gets only those linked sessions with active messages for a given session Id. The newest session starts the collection in the linked sessions.
        Parameters:
        querySessionId - the session identifier
        Returns:
        set of linked sessions with active messages

      • deleteMessagesByRange

        void deleteMessagesByRange(long sessionId,
                           long startMessageSeqNum,
                           long endMessageSeqNum)
                    throws StorageModuleException
        Delete a range of messages from a session.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id to be deleted.
        startMessageSeqNum - starting message channel sequence number.
        endMessageSeqNum - ending message channel sequence number.
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException - database state is not consistent

      • deleteSession

        void deleteSession(long sessionId)
            throws StorageModuleException
        Delete session. When the to-be-deleted session is the last session in that channel, the underlying channel will also be deleted.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id to be deleted
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException - unable to delete session

      • saveMessage

        long saveMessage(long sessionId,
                 PersistentMessage persistentMessage)
          throws StorageModuleException
        Save message with a given sessionId.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        persistentMessage - the persistent message
        Returns:
        message Id
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException - when unable to save message

      • getMessages

        List<PersistentMessage> getMessages(long sessionId)
                             throws StorageModuleException
        Gets all messages for a given sessionId.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        Returns:
        a list of messages under that given sessionId
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException

      • getMessages

        List<PersistentMessage> getMessages(long sessionId,
                                    int limit,
                                    int offset)
                             throws StorageModuleException
        Gets messages for a given sessionId with starting offset and the limit number of messages.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        limit - the maximum number of messages to return
        offset - the number of messages to skip before returning messages
        Returns:
        a list of messages under the searching criteria
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException

      • deleteMessages

        boolean deleteMessages(long sessionId)
                throws StorageModuleException
        Delete messages for a given sessionId.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        Returns:
        boolean to indicate success deletion
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException

      • deleteMessage

        void deleteMessage(long sessionId,
                   long channelSequenceNumber)
            throws StorageModuleException
        Delete messages for a given sessionId and persistentMessageId in byte format.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        channelSequenceNumber - the channel sequence number
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException

      • getSessionSize

        int getSessionSize(long sessionId)
        Gets the number of messages for a given sessionId.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        Returns:
        an non-negative integer number to indicate the number of messages associated with a given session

        Returns:

        Returns:
        the session identifier
        Throws:
        StorageModuleException
